**GreenCloudVPS** was founded on October 6, 2013 and is approaching its 5th birthday tomorrow! There is no better way to celebrate our Birthday than with you, our beloved customers.

**Why Us?**

- Owned hardware: We own all our hardware and network equipment.
- Fast ticket response with average of 20 mins.
- 24x7 In-house Professional Tech Support
- 99.9% Network Uptime Guaranteed
- 7 day money back guarantee

We are very happy to present our Birthday promotions, with up to 50% off recurring. All offers are valid until **October 10, 2018** only so hurry!

- 40% off recurring all of our **[SSD KVM VPS](https://greencloudvps.com/kvm-vps.php)**, included both **[1Gbps KVM](https://greencloudvps.com/kvm-vps-us.php)** and **[10Gbps KVM](https://greencloudvps.com/kvm-10gbps-vps.php)** with semi-annually and annually payments. Use the coupon **HFQV23DCI8**
- 50% off recurring our **[macOS VPS](https://cloudxmac.com/)**, with quarterly, semi-annually and annually payments. Use the coupon: **IGEBDZV87J**
